titles.title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to continue the exemption of certain institutions of higher education serving minorities from default-based ineligibility for student loan programs.

bill.summary: 2/12/1997--Introduced. Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to extend through FY 2003 the exemption of certain institutions of higher education serving minorities, including historically Black colleges and universities, from default-based ineligibility for student loan programs.
